CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
CASE(TEXT(Class__c), "Websites for Beginners", "/resource/WFT/WFTRegistration/websites-for-beginners.png",
"Mobile-Friendly Websites", "/resource/WFT/WFTRegistration/mobile-friendly-websites.png",
"Javascript for Beginners", "/resource/WFT/WFTRegistration/javascript-for-beginners.png",
"React.", "/resource/WFT/WFTRegistration/react.png",
"/resource/WFT/WFTRegistration/specialty-classes.png"), TEXT(Class__c))
CustomField.label: Name Graphic
